document.title: Songbook 3.6.0
document.content:
A new release of the songbook is available. 3.60 features a heavy set of small corrections for more than 150 songs (mainly typos and diagrams).

Debian packages for the Songbook-Client have been updated to version 0.7.4 (thx Lohrun).

New songs

yoyoma
  • Razorlight - America
  • U2 - One
  • America - A Horse With No Name
Crep
  • Bloodhound Gang - Fire water burn
  • Pascale Picard - Smilin'
  • Coluche - Sois fain√©ant
